mapper.select: select username ,nickname,pyname from jq_sysuser where userType=1 and (${qc.where}) ;
mapper.insert: insert into jq_sysuser ( `password`, `nickname`, `userType`, `username`, `pyname`, `sex`, `birthday`, `children`, `firstName`, `lastName`, `surname`, `givename`, `father`, `fatherPhone`, `mother`, `motherPhone` ) values( #{password}, #{nickname}, #{userType}, #{username}, #{pyname}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{children}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{surname}, #{givename}, #{father}, #{fatherPhone}, #{mother}, #{motherPhone} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sex=VALUES(`sex`), birthday=VALUES(`birthday`), nickname=VALUES(`nickname`), pyname=VALUES(`pyname`), firstName=VALUES(`firstName`), lastName=VALUES(`lastName`), surname=VALUES(`surname`), givename=VALUES(`givename`), userType=VALUES(`userType`), father=VALUES(`father`), fatherPhone=VALUES(`fatherPhone`), mother=VALUES(`mother`), motherPhone=VALUES(`motherPhone`);
